message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm selling it to you for $1000000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand you have a budget constraint, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm counteroffering at $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $850000, but that's as high as I can go. I really think this product is a great fit for me, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, and I'm glad you see the value in this product. However, I'm not willing to go below $950000. I'm willing to meet you at $900000, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $920000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not accepted.
